event.description: If specified, the game event with this namespace and ID will be prevent from being emitted by the entity.

events.description: If specified, the game events with these namespace and IDs will be prevent from being emitted by the entity.

tag.description: If specified, the game events inside game event tag will be prevented from being emitted by the entity.

entity_action.description: If specified, this action will be executed on the entity upon preventing game events.
